title: Force exerted by block Y on block X

content.question: A force F accelerates a system of two blocks, X and Y, on a horizontal frictionless surface, as shown above. The acceleration is 4 m/s2 . The force with which block Y pushes on block X has magnitude

skill.text: 2.B: Calculate or estimate an unknown quantity with units from known quantities, by selecting and following a logical computational pathway.
